description:
Azbit is a licensed blockchain-based banking platform working under Roger Ver’s advisory. The project is being created for crypto traders and crypto investors and aims to build a bridge between the world of traditional finance and cryptocurrencies.

Blockchain banking is a core element of the project. Azbit customers will gain access to fiat banking and financial services, as well as brokerage services providing the possibility to trade on traditional stocks, forex, and options markets.

The next considerable element of Azbit project is an investment platform. Newbie users will be able to copy the transactions of leading crypto traders. Experienced traders in turn can increase their trading capital by attracting new investors. Azbit is developing an investment platform together with leading traders and proficient industry experts to create investment and trading tools according to customers’ demands.
name: Azbit Platform
